Container.Description: [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Description[/span][/u][/b][br] Authelia is an open-source authentication and authorization server providing 2-factor authentication and single sign-on (SSO) for your applications via a web portal. It acts as a companion of reverse proxies like nginx, Traefik or HAProxy to let them know whether queries should pass through. Instructions: https://github.com/ibracorp/authelia.
